error-blockedInvestment: All your funds are pending to be transferred out of the service.

afterPosition.title: Withdraw After Positions Close
afterPosition.description: You will receive your funds after the trader free them. Take into account that your investment is at risk until is transferred to you. This usually takes a few days, but could take more. It is up to them.

instant.title: Instant Withdrawal
instant.description: Instant withdrawals incur a 5% fee because the trader has open positions and could be liquidated. To avoid this, Zignaly must cover your funds and inherit your risk, hence the fee.

modalSuccess.title: Investment Processing (Up to 24h)
modalSuccess.description: Your funds will be transferred into the service’s account within 24 hours. You may withdraw your funds anytime before this transfer is made. Once funds are transferred, you’ll be able to withdraw via a <0>soft</0> or <0>hard disconnection.</0>

invest-modal.type-transfer: Type the word “{{word}}” in the field below to complete the transfer:
invest-modal.transfer-error: Invalid value. Please type the correct word.
invest-modal.i-understand-margin: I understand my whole {{coin}} balance is now part of the margin and at risk
invest-modal.i-understand-money-transferred: I understand my funds will be transferred to the trader's pool and will no longer appear in my available balance
